dashboard.title: UrbanEye

dashboard.heroSubtitle: Report civic issues, track their progress, and engage with your community. Together, we're building a better, more responsive city for everyone.
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Ready to make a difference in your community today?
dashboard.impactSubtitle: See how our community is working together to solve local issues and improve our city. Your participation makes a difference.
dashboard.servicesTitle: How You Can Make a Difference
dashboard.servicesSubtitle: Discover the tools and services available to help you engage with your community and create positive change.
dashboard.activitySubtitle: Track your civic engagement and see the impact of your contributions to the community.
dashboard.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about reporting issues and engaging with your community

reportIssues.title: Report Issues
reportIssues.description: Report potholes, broken streetlights, water leaks, and other civic problems

communityFeed.title: Community Feed
communityFeed.description: See what issues your neighbors are reporting and join the conversation

myReports.title: My Reports
myReports.description: Track the progress of your submitted reports from start to resolution

emergencyServices.title: Emergency Services
emergencyServices.description: Quick access to emergency contacts and urgent issue reporting

stats.issuesResolvedDesc: Average resolution rate for citizen reports

howToReport.question: How do I report a civic issue?
howToReport.answer: Simply click 'Report an Issue', fill out the form with details and location, and submit. You'll receive updates on progress.

trackStatus.question: Can I track the status of my reports?
trackStatus.answer: Yes! Visit 'My Reports' to see all your submissions and their current status - from pending to resolved.

privacy.question: Is my personal information kept private?
privacy.answer: Absolutely. You can report anonymously, and we only share necessary details with relevant city departments.

resolutionTime.question: How long does it take to resolve issues?
resolutionTime.answer: Response times vary by issue type and priority. You'll receive regular updates throughout the resolution process.

publicFeed.question: Can I see what others are reporting?
publicFeed.answer: Yes! Check the Public Feed to see community issues, upvote important ones, and engage in civic discussions.

issueTypes.question: What types of issues can I report?
issueTypes.answer: Road problems, water issues, waste management, street lighting, parks, safety concerns, and much more!

footer.description: Empowering citizens to build smarter, better communities through civic engagement and digital innovation.
footer.copyright: © 2024 UrbanEye. All rights reserved. Building better cities together.
